QuestData.Title: The Aid of the Loa
QuestData.Description:
De blood trolls are stronger than ever, thanks to dis G'huun... and now dey are empowering a giant construct!
We need a plan to destroy dat construct, G'huun, and de blood trolls. It is not going to be easy.
But I have an idea.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hold council with Talanji and Rokhan to decide your next steps.
